profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
Doctor Screen is the Doctor that makes house calls to fix your screen doors. You will no longer have to go to the trouble to arrange that yourself! We do it all onsite. 

We offer many solutions for all of your screening needs. Solar Screens,Patio Shades, Sliding Screen Doors and many other items. We can do screens that do not disturb your view as well as screens that offer privacy in your home or on your patio. From a job as simple as a window or door re-screen to something as big as a new screen porch or screened enclosure, give us a call. We can repair or replace all screens. We are your screen experts.


Door Screen Replacement Service On site rebuilding of bent broken frames window cranks patio sliding doors etc.

Selling Distributorships across Canada for Entrepreneurs

profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.
service_area: We have 13 branch areas across Ontario: Barrie, Brantford, Burlington, Chatham, Kitchener, Listowel, London, Mississauga, Sarnia, Orangeville, Owen Sound, Windsor, Oshawa and every town in between.

Replacement door installation. Retrofit installation. Full frame tear-out installation. Custom colour matching. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.

profile:
Clera Windows + Doors by FM Industries has been manufacturing and installing windows and doors throughout all of Ontario since 1978.  They add beauty and value to nearly 1000 homes every month and can easily service the entire province via one of their 37 sales and installation offices.

 

Clera Windows + Doors has been recognized as one of Canada’s Best 50 Privately Managed Companies and the City of Vaughan’s Company of the Year.  Clera was recently awarded the Houzz service award for 2014 and is a proud recipient of the Homestars Best Award for 2012 and 2013. Add to these achievements a stellar A+ Better Business Bureau rating and you’ll understand why Clera Windows + Doors is the best choice for new windows and doors for your home.

 

We manufacture.  We install.  You save.

profile:
Panes window manufacturing is a family owned business that specializes in the manufacturing of high-quality, high-efficiency vinyl windows. With over 100 years of combined experience, Our team consists of highly qualified professionals in the Window Manufacturing industry. 

Integrity and Innovation
Panes Window Manufacturing has always coupled its commitment to innovative and performance-driven products with its unwavering dedication to customer service. Those were our values yesterday. Those are our values today. 

As pioneers in the window and door industry, Panes Window Manufacturing continually listens to the needs of the industry. The result is ongoing research and development of highly innovative, top performing, and beautifully crafted windows. 

Highlights
Custom crafted windows
Extensive and highly innovative product offering Premium quality materials
Design flexibility with countless options available
Industry leader in energy efficiency and ENERGY STAR® partner
Knowledgeable customer care teams
Experienced field service support
Architectural support
Environmentally responsible

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

profile:
AM Group of Companies has been in operation since 1956 and is a 3rd generation family business.

We stand behind our work with one of the best warranties in the business, 10 years. This is only possible as a result of three things: the use of premium products, good workmanship and careful inspection of completed work.

AM Group of Companies hires only skilled workers who are regularly educated on installation methods and new materials. Our corporate education programs apply to all facets of the business.

Proudly situated in Guelph, London, Owen Sound, Gravenhurst and Collingwood, our size and office geography allow us to deliver corporate-grade professionalism while maintaining top rate local customer service.

AM Group of Companies Services:
Commercial Roofing
Residential Roofing
Fiberglass Shingles, Metal Roof, Flat Roof, Cedar Shakes & Shingles, Composite Roofing, Inspire, Owens Corning, Enviroshake.
Eavestrough, Soffit, Fascia and other Aluminum work
Attic Insulation, Blown In Insulation
Skylights, Velux
Ventilation
Roof repair & replacement
Siding
Windows & Doors
Vinyl Windows
Entry Doors
Patio Doors
 
Contact us today for a Free, no obligation estimate.
1-877-281-6900

profile:
Phantom Screens/ Ontario Screen Systems offers a beautiful alternative to traditional insect screens. Manufactured in Canada, Phantom retractable screens disappear when not in use and come in a variety of colours to match virtually any décor, all while blending in perfectly with door trim to maintaining the home’s architectural integrity. 

These screens can be cover all window types including casement, awning, single & double-hung, sliding and tilt ‘n’turn windows.

They are also customized for double french doors, swing in swing out doors, sliding doors, and oversized doors.

Motorized retractable screens by Phantom provide insect protection, climate control and solar shading without blocking your views.

Visit https://phantomscreens.ca/ and talk to a Screen Expert today.
products: All of Phantom Screens, including retractable screen doors, windows and motorized screens
services: Our trained installation technicians and the Limited Lifetime Warranty ensure that Phantom Screens last a lifetime.
specialities:
Once you've made contact with us at Ontario Screen Systems Inc., we will talk to you about your requirements and ideas you have. We’ll then take detailed measurements and prepare you an estimate. We'll also schedule an installation date with you.

Depending on how many doors and window screens you order, most installations are completed within one day. However, before we schedule an installation with you we will take into account any manufacturing lead times when ordering your screens. There are a number of installation options for our large opening (manual and motorized) screens including fully recessed and surface mounted and so the time taken for installation will vary for every project.

Our door and window screens, as well as our screens for large openings are professionally installed by Phantom-trained installers who will treat your home with care.

Call us today and experience Phantom Screens.
memberships: ACMO, BILD, CCI, CSC, MBOT, RCC
name: Phantom Screens / Ontario Screen Systems Inc.

profile: Vinyl Window Designs (VWD) is a manufacturer of residential vinyl windows, entry doors and patio doors. For over 30 years VWD has built a solid reputation for providing the best quality products at a great value for residential home renovation, custom homes and high-end home developments. VWD builds every component of their window and patio doors from vinyl to glass in our 200,000 sq. ft. facility featuring state-of-the-art machinery and expert craftspeople. We’re driven to provide the best in convenience and performance with their extensive lines of products, upgrades and accessories. Our window products qualify for some of the most prestigious product certifications offered in North America. We are one of the few that have chosen to work closely with the Canadian Standards Association Certification Program in Canada and with both the National Fenestration Ratings Council and with ENERGYSTAR ®.

profile:
Who We Are
For over 15 years general contractor Monty Romeo has been devoted to offering his construction services and project management skills across Ontario.  After many years of running multiple companies with dedication and great success, Monty founded  his construction company Innovative Framework.  He and his team of home builders will work with you to build a team that will best suit your needs for your new home.

What We Do
From design to construction, all aspects of our projects are matched with professionals to ensure the project is delivered and completed as designed and planned with the homeowner.  Our commercial and residential projects include both new construction and repairs/restorations.  Occupied and fully operational job sites are never an issue, we can also plan, manage, and build multi-phase projects and sites.  

Why Choose Us?
Our goal is an end-to-end client experience that includes seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, onsite organization and substantial quality workmanship every time. Call us today and bring our project management skills and extensive construction experience to your next project.
